document_data.name: Eagle
document_data.mainbody: '''Eagles''' were large, majestic birds of prey that were often seen as symbols of nobility or as divine messengers.
document_data.Description: They were generally larger than other birds, with a powerful build and heavier head and beak. They possess broad wings allowing for faster flight. Eagles tended to be around {{SI|3|ft}} long, with an average wingspan of {{SI|7|ft}}.
document_data.Combat: Eagles hunted their prey from the sky using their enhanced vision, which enabled them to see small animals from great distances away. They captured food with their long and powerful talons.

Ecology.Habitats: Beyond the [[Prime Material]], eagles could be found on the [[Krigala]] level of the [[Beastlands (plane)|Beastlands]].

In Culture.Individuals: *[[Eagle (spirit)|Eagle]] was also an [[animal spirit]] worshiped by the [[Wild elf|green elves]] of [[Evermeet]].
In Culture.Place names:
*[[Eagle Peak]]
*[[Eagles' Eyrie]]
*[[Eagle Hills]]
*[[Aerie of the Snow Eagles]]
